dialogue.speaker: Samantha
dialogue.text: Welcome to our village! What brings you here today?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I'm just passing through, looking for some adventure.

dialogue.speaker: Samantha
dialogue.text: Well, you've come to the right place! We have a mysterious forest nearby that's said to be full of secrets.

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: That sounds interesting. Where is this forest?
